name: RetroBot
description: RetroBot is an oscilloscope-themed robot, part of the WebtrES club. With a vibrant red body color resembling Rosso Corsa, it captures the essence of classic retro consoles. Its arms and legs are designed in a timeless and classic style, perfectly complementing its retro aesthetic. The screen retains the charm of vintage displays, while the addition of shades adds a touch of coolness to its overall appearance.
